item.title: The Need for Digital Literacy
item.description: These last few weeks, with the lockdown in place and having to work from home, I’m being utilized to the fullest by those in my social circle. When it comes to help with tech stuff that is :) While it is clear that these people, friends and family, are a little lacking in technical knowledge which we techies consider ‘basic’, I think there are some deeper issues that create such situations.
